言.definition: words; speech; to say; to talk

言不可傳.definition: impossible to put into words; inexpressible

言不由衷.definition: to say sth without meaning it (idiom); to speak tongue in cheek; saying one thing but meaning sth different

言不盡意.definition: (conventional letter ending) words cannot fully express what is in my heart (idiom)

言中.definition: to have one's words prove to be prophetic

言之無物.definition: (of a writing etc) to have no substance (idiom); to carry no weight

言傳身教.definition: to teach by words and example (idiom)

言喻.definition: to describe; to put into words

言外之意.definition: (idiom) unspoken implication; the actual meaning of what was said

言多必失.definition: if you say too much, you're bound to slip up at some point (idiom)

言多語失.definition: see 言多必失[yan2 duo1 bi4 shi1]

言字旁.definition: name of "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149); see also 訁|讠[yan2]

言必信，行必果.pinyin: yan2 bi4 xin4 , xing2 bi4 guo3
言必信，行必果.definition: one must be a man of his word and resolute in his work (proverb)

言情.definition: (of a movie, novel etc) portraying a love affair; romantic; sentimental

言教不如身教.pinyin: yan2 jiao4 bu4 ru2 shen1 jiao4
言教不如身教.definition: Explaining in words is not as good as teaching by example (idiom). Action speaks louder than words.

言歸於好.definition: to become reconciled; to bury the hatchet

言歸正傳.definition: to return to the topic (idiom); to get back to the main point

言猶在耳.definition: words still ringing in one's ears (idiom)

言符其實.definition: (of one's words) to be in accord with reality (idiom)

言者無意，聽者有心.pinyin: yan2 zhe3 wu2 yi4 , ting1 zhe3 you3 xin1
言者無意，聽者有心.definition: to take a casual remark to heart (idiom)

言者無罪，聞者足戒.pinyin: yan2 zhe3 wu2 zui4 , wen2 zhe3 zu2 jie4
言者無罪，聞者足戒.definition: don't blame the speaker, take note of his warning (idiom); an exhortation to speak one's mind without fear of reprisals, and with the expectation of being taken seriously

言而有信.definition: to speak and keep one's promise (idiom); as good as one's word

言而無信.definition: untrustworthy; not true to one's word

言聽計從.definition: to see, hear and obey (idiom); to take advice; to take sb at his word

言行.definition: words and actions; what one says and what one does

言行一致.definition: (idiom) one's actions are in keeping with what one says

言行不一.definition: (idiom) to say one thing and do another

言行不符.definition: (idiom) to say one thing and do another

言行若一.definition: (idiom) one's actions are in keeping with what one says

言詞.definition: variant of 言辭|言辞[yan2 ci2]

言說.definition: to speak of; to refer to

言談.definition: discourse; words; utterance; what one says; manner of speech

言論.definition: expression of opinion; views; remarks; arguments

言近旨遠.definition: simple words with a profound meaning (idiom)

言過其實.definition: (idiom) to exaggerate; to overstate the facts
